00018 #ifndef I2C_H
00019 #define I2C_H
00020 
00021 /* TWSR values (not bits) */
00022 /* Master */
00023 #define TW_START                    0x08
00024 #define TW_REP_START                0x10
00025 /* Master Transmitter */
00026 #define TW_MT_SLA_ACK               0x18
00027 #define TW_MT_SLA_NACK              0x20
00028 #define TW_MT_DATA_ACK              0x28
00029 #define TW_MT_DATA_NACK             0x30
00030 #define TW_MT_ARB_LOST              0x38
00031 /* Master Receiver */
00032 #define TW_MR_ARB_LOST              0x38
00033 #define TW_MR_SLA_ACK               0x40
00034 #define TW_MR_SLA_NACK              0x48
00035 #define TW_MR_DATA_ACK              0x50
00036 #define TW_MR_DATA_NACK             0x58
00037 /* Slave Transmitter */
00038 #define TW_ST_SLA_ACK               0xA8
00039 #define TW_ST_ARB_LOST_SLA_ACK      0xB0
00040 #define TW_ST_DATA_ACK              0xB8
00041 #define TW_ST_DATA_NACK             0xC0
00042 #define TW_ST_LAST_DATA             0xC8
00043 /* Slave Receiver */
00044 #define TW_SR_SLA_ACK               0x60
00045 #define TW_SR_ARB_LOST_SLA_ACK      0x68
00046 #define TW_SR_GCALL_ACK             0x70
00047 #define TW_SR_ARB_LOST_GCALL_ACK    0x78
00048 #define TW_SR_DATA_ACK              0x80
00049 #define TW_SR_DATA_NACK             0x88
00050 #define TW_SR_GCALL_DATA_ACK        0x90
00051 #define TW_SR_GCALL_DATA_NACK       0x98
00052 #define TW_SR_STOP                  0xA0
00053 /* Misc */
00054 #define TW_NO_INFO                  0xF8
00055 #define TW_BUS_ERROR                0x00
00056 
00057 // bit defines
00058 #define I2CON_AA            2
00059 #define I2CON_SI            3
00060 #define I2CON_STO           4
00061 #define I2CON_STA           5
00062 #define I2CON_I2EN          6
00063 
00064 // defines and constants
00065 #define TWCR_CMD_MASK       0x0F
00066 #define TWSR_STATUS_MASK    0xF8
00067 
00068 // return values
00069 #define I2C_OK              0x00
00070 #define I2C_ERROR_NODEV     0x01
00071 
00072 // types
00073 typedef enum
00074 {
00075     I2C_IDLE = 0, I2C_BUSY = 1,
00076     I2C_MASTER_TX = 2, I2C_MASTER_RX = 3,
00077     I2C_SLAVE_TX = 4, I2C_SLAVE_RX = 5
00078 } eI2cStateType;
00079 
00080 // functions
00081 
00082 //! Initialize I2C (TWI) interface
00083 void i2cInit(void);
00084 
00085 //! Set the I2C transaction bitrate (in KHz)
00086 void i2cSetBitrate(u16 bitrateKHz);
00087 
00088 // I2C setup and configurations commands
00089 //! Set the local (AVR processor's) I2C device address
00090 void i2cSetLocalDeviceAddr(u08 deviceAddr, u08 genCallEn);
00091 
00092 // Low-level I2C transaction commands 
00093 //! Send an I2C start condition in Master mode
00094 void i2cSendStart(void);
00095 //! Send an I2C stop condition in Master mode
00096 void i2cSendStop(void);
00097 //! Wait for current I2C operation to complete
00098 void i2cWaitForComplete(void);
00099 //! Send an (address|R/W) combination or a data byte over I2C
00100 void i2cSendByte(u08 data);
00101 //! Receive a data byte over I2C  
00102 // ackFlag = TRUE if recevied data should be ACK'ed
00103 // ackFlag = FALSE if recevied data should be NACK'ed
00104 void i2cReceiveByte(u08 ackFlag);
00105 //! Pick up the data that was received with i2cReceiveByte()
00106 u08 i2cGetReceivedByte(void);
00107 //! Get current I2c bus status from TWSR
00108 u08 i2cGetStatus(void);
00109 
00110 // high-level I2C transaction commands
00111 
00112 //! send I2C data to a device on the bus (non-interrupt based)
00113 u08 i2cMasterSendNI(u08 deviceAddr, u08 length, u08* data);
00114 //! receive I2C data from a device on the bus (non-interrupt based)
00115 u08 i2cMasterReceiveNI(u08 deviceAddr, u08 length, u08 *data);
00116 
00117 #endif
